text.content: A simulator for an end-to-end payment pipeline (authorize, capture, sale, refund, void). The goal is purely educational: to explore, practice, and understand payment workflows and related backend/cloud technologies. This project is not intended for business use.

text.content: Notion Tip: A company mission provides direction and purpose, aligning actions and decisions towards a common goal. It also helps attract like-minded individuals who share the same values and vision for the company.

rich_text.plain_text: Notion Tip: A company mission provides direction and purpose, aligning actions and decisions towards a common goal. It also helps attract like-minded individuals who share the same values and vision for the company.

text.content: Notion Tip: A corporate travel policy is crucial for controlling costs, ensuring compliance, and guaranteeing the safety of employees when traveling for the company.

rich_text.plain_text: Notion Tip: A corporate travel policy is crucial for controlling costs, ensuring compliance, and guaranteeing the safety of employees when traveling for the company.

text.content: Notion Tip: Telling employees about news about your company is important because it helps them stay informed about the direction of the company and their role in it. It can also increase employee engagement and help them feel more connected to the company's mission and values.

rich_text.plain_text: Notion Tip: Telling employees about news about your company is important because it helps them stay informed about the direction of the company and their role in it. It can also increase employee engagement and help them feel more connected to the company's mission and values.

text.content: Notion Tip: Vacation policies are crucial for employee well-being and productivity. They provide rest and recharge, reduce burnout and increase job satisfaction.

rich_text.plain_text: Notion Tip: Vacation policies are crucial for employee well-being and productivity. They provide rest and recharge, reduce burnout and increase job satisfaction.

text.content: Notion Tip: Morale events increase employee satisfaction, motivation, and well-being, while promoting community and teamwork, resulting in higher productivity and retention rates.

rich_text.plain_text: Notion Tip: Morale events increase employee satisfaction, motivation, and well-being, while promoting community and teamwork, resulting in higher productivity and retention rates.

text.content: Notion Tip: Benefits policies can attract and retain employees, promote well-being, create positive culture, differentiate from competitors, and increase morale and satisfaction.
